TopicTitle: What is the difference between KW Rocketry

Articles.Content: So I'm trying to download KW Rocketry but it seems there are a bunch different versions from KW Rocketry to Redux and Rebalanced. Which one should I get, Which one is the right one or the newest and where do I get it? What is the difference between all of them?

Modding question moved to the modding subforum. 

And I don't know the answer.

Redux seems to be an older version while the Rebalanced verison seems to have changed the fuel amounts in the tanks amongst other balancing aspects, hence the name.

Though I don't linger in this section, so I may be entirely off.

On 7/2/2018 at 10:42 PM, max17 said:

So I'm trying to download KW Rocketry but it seems there are a bunch different versions from KW Rocketry to Redux and Rebalanced. Which one should I get, Which one is the right one or the newest and where do I get it? What is the difference between all of them?

Assuming you are running 1.4.3 (or any 1.4), you should get the KW Rocketry Rebalanced.  It is the latest update, and fixed a number of balance issues regarding tank masses and volumes
Nope, I got 1.2.2. Can you get me the link for rebalanced for game version 1.2.2 if it even supports it? I can't find it.

6 hours ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Assuming you are running 1.4.3 (or any 1.4), you should get the KW Rocketry Rebalanced.  It is the latest update, and fixed a number of balance issues regarding tank masses and volumes

Nope, I got 1.2.2. Can you get me the link for rebalanced for game version 1.2.2 if it even supports it? I can't find it.
Just download the latest version from Spacedock, it should work
